docs.title: Welcome to Subscription Documentation
docs.text: This documentation provides comprehensive information about our subscription feature, including user guides and technical documentation.

docs.title: 📚 User Guide
docs.text:
The User Guide section contains everything you need to know about using the subscription features:

  • Getting Started - Learn the basics of subscriptions
  • Managing Subscriptions - Create, update, and cancel subscriptions
  • Billing & Payments - Understand billing cycles and payment methods
  • FAQ - Frequently asked questions

Go to User Guide →

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.text: This document describes the technical exposure of the subscription system.

docs.title: Core Services
docs.text:
graph TD
    A[API Gateway] --> B[Subscription Service]
    B --> C[Payment Processor]
    B --> D[Database]
    B --> E[Notification Service]

docs.title: Subscription Service
docs.text:
The subscription service handles:

  • Subscription lifecycle management
  • Plan management
  • Billing cycle processing
  • Payment integration

docs.title: Database Layer
docs.text:
Key tables:

  • subscriptions - Active and historical subscriptions
  • plans - Available subscription plans
  • payments - Payment transactions
  • users - User accounts

docs.title: Getting Started with Subscriptions
docs.text: This guide will help you understand and use the subscription features.

docs.title: What is a Subscription?
docs.text: A subscription is a recurring payment arrangement that gives you access to products or services.

docs.title: Creating Your First Subscription
docs.text:
1. Navigate to the subscription page
  2. Select your desired plan
  3. Enter payment information
  4. Confirm your subscription

Tip

You can cancel your subscription at any time without penalty.

docs.title: Subscription Plans
docs.text:
We offer three types of subscription plans:

  • Basic - Essential features for individuals
  • Pro - Advanced features for professionals
  • Enterprise - Full features for organizations
